author: Jackie Fox
title: The Cork man helping New Yorkers to grieve
description: Clive Anderson, owner of Pelham Funeral Home near Manhattan, spoke to RTÉ's States Of Mind podcast about how he's working to help people through a traumatising time in a new restrictive world.
content:
Irishman Clive Anderson got an alarming letter from his local medical examiner's office last week.
The letter said that New York officials were expecting 5,000 deaths due to Covid-19 and they needed his help.
"Now, that puts goosebumps on the back of your h… [+5655 chars]
